text: Yoon Yoo-sun (born January 17, 1969) is a South Korean actress. She began her career as a child actress in 1975, and continues to be active in film and television, notably in The Story of Two Women (1994), Even If the Wind Blows (1995), High Kick: Revenge of the Short Legged (2011) and Another Promise (2014). == Filmography == === Film === {| class="wikitable" style="width:650px" |- ! width=10|Year !
